00097 template <class _Traits> SPACE mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::dist(sVertex *p0, sVertex *p1 MF_DMUTEXV)
00098 {
00099         return sqrt((p0->getCoord(0) - p1->getCoord(0))*(p0->getCoord(0) - p1->getCoord(0)) +
00100         (p0->getCoord(1) - p1->getCoord(1))*(p0->getCoord(1) - p1->getCoord(1)));
00101 }
00102 
00103 template <class _Traits> SPACE mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::dist(space *p0, space *p1 MF_DMUTEXV)
00104 {
00105         return sqrt((p0[0] - p1[0])*(p0[0] - p1[0]) + (p0[1] - p1[1])*(p0[1] - p1[1]));
00106 }

00109 template <class _Traits> int mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::inLeft(sVertex *p0, sVertex *p1, sVertex *p2 MF_DMUTEXV)
00110 {
00111         // Retorna 1 caso esteja a esquerda
00112         // Retorna 0 caso esteja a direita
00113         // Retorna 2 caso esteja sobre
00114 
00115 //      space n_v, n_w;
00116         space v[2] = {p1->getCoord(0) - p0->getCoord(0), p1->getCoord(1) - p0->getCoord(1)};
00117         space w[2] = {p2->getCoord(0) - p0->getCoord(0), p2->getCoord(1) - p0->getCoord(1)};
00118 
00119 //      n_v = norm2d(v);
00120 //      v[0] = v[0]/n_v;
00121 //      v[1] = v[1]/n_v;
00122 //
00123 //      n_w = norm2d(w);
00124 //      w[0] = w[0]/n_w;
00125 //      w[1] = w[1]/n_w;
00126 
00127         space i = ( v[0]*w[1] - w[0]*v[1] );
00128 //      space i = ( (p1->getCoord(0) - p0->getCoord(0))*(p2->getCoord(1) - p0->getCoord(1)) - (p2->getCoord(0) - p0->getCoord(0))*(p1->getCoord(1) - p0->getCoord(1)) );
00129 
00130         if (i > erro)
00131                 return 1;
00132         else
00133         {
00134                 if(i < - erro)
00135                         return 0;
00136                 else
00137                         return 2;
00138         }

00141 template <class _Traits> int mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::inLeft(sVertex *p0, sVertex *p1, space coord0, space coord1 MF_DMUTEXV)
00142 {
00143         // Retorna 1 caso esteja a esquerda
00144         // Retorna 0 caso esteja a direita
00145         // Retorna 2 caso esteja sobre
00146 
00147         space i = ( (p1->getCoord(0) - p0->getCoord(0))*(coord1 - p0->getCoord(1)) - (coord0 - p0->getCoord(0))*(p1->getCoord(1) - p0->getCoord(1)) );
00148 
00149         if (i > erro)
00150                 return 1;
00151         else
00152         {
00153                 if(i < - erro)
00154                         return 0;
00155                 else
00156                         return 2;
00157         }
00158 }

00272 template <class _Traits> int mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::inCircle(sCell *c, sVertex *p MF_DMUTEXV)
00273 {
00274         // Retorna 1 caso p esteja dentro do circuncirculo
00275         // Retorna 0 caso p esteja fora do circuncirculo
00276         // Retorna 2 caso p esteja sobre o circuncirculo
00277         
00278         sVertex *p1 = mesh->getVertex(c->getVertexId(0)),
00279                         *p2 = mesh->getVertex(c->getVertexId(1)),
00280                         *p3 = mesh->getVertex(c->getVertexId(2));
00281         
00282         /*
00283         space a[4][4];
00284         
00285         a[0][0] = p1->getCoord(0);
00286         a[0][1] = p1->getCoord(1);
00287         a[0][2] = (p1->getCoord(0)*p1->getCoord(0))+(p1->getCoord(1)*p1->getCoord(1));
00288         a[0][3] = 1;
00289         a[1][0] = p2->getCoord(0);
00290         a[1][1] = p2->getCoord(1);
00291         a[1][2] = (p2->getCoord(0)*p2->getCoord(0))+(p2->getCoord(1)*p2->getCoord(1));
00292         a[1][3] = 1;
00293         a[2][0] = p3->getCoord(0);
00294         a[2][1] = p3->getCoord(1);
00295         a[2][2] = (p3->getCoord(0)*p3->getCoord(0))+(p3->getCoord(1)*p3->getCoord(1));
00296         a[2][3] = 1;
00297         a[3][0] = p->getCoord(0);
00298         a[3][1] = p->getCoord(1);
00299         a[3][2] = (p->getCoord(0)*p->getCoord(0))+(p->getCoord(1)*p->getCoord(1));
00300         a[3][3] = 1;
00301         
00302         space i = det(a);
00303         
00304         if (i > MF_ERRO_INCIRCLE)
00305                 return 1;
00306         else
00307         {
00308                 if(i < - MF_ERRO_INCIRCLE)
00309                         return 0;
00310                 else
00311                         return 2;
00312         }
00313         */
00314 
00315         space a[3][3];
00316 
00317         a[0][0] = p2->getCoord(0) - p1->getCoord(0);
00318         a[0][1] = p2->getCoord(1) - p1->getCoord(1);
00319         a[0][2] = a[0][0]*a[0][0] + a[0][1]*a[0][1];
00320 
00321         a[1][0] = p3->getCoord(0) - p1->getCoord(0);
00322         a[1][1] = p3->getCoord(1) - p1->getCoord(1);
00323         a[1][2] = a[1][0]*a[1][0] + a[1][1]*a[1][1];
00324 
00325         a[2][0] = p->getCoord(0) - p1->getCoord(0);
00326         a[2][1] = p->getCoord(1) - p1->getCoord(1);
00327         a[2][2] = a[2][0]*a[2][0] + a[2][1]*a[2][1];
00328 
00329         space i = det3(a);
00330 
00331         if (i > MF_ERRO_INCIRCLE)
00332                 return 0;
00333         else
00334         {
00335                 if(i < - MF_ERRO_INCIRCLE)
00336                         return 1;
00337                 else
00338                         return 2;
00339         }
00340 }
00341 
00342 template <class _Traits> SPACE mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::det(space matrix[4][4])
00343 {
00344         return(
00345                 (matrix[0][0]*(
00346                 matrix[1][1]*matrix[2][2]*matrix[3][3]+
00347                 matrix[1][2]*matrix[2][3]*matrix[3][1]+
00348                 matrix[1][3]*matrix[2][1]*matrix[3][2]-
00349                 matrix[1][3]*matrix[2][2]*matrix[3][1]-
00350                 matrix[1][2]*matrix[2][1]*matrix[3][3]-
00351                 matrix[1][1]*matrix[2][3]*matrix[3][2]))+
00352 
00353                 ((-1)*matrix[1][0]*(
00354                 matrix[0][1]*matrix[2][2]*matrix[3][3]+
00355                 matrix[0][2]*matrix[2][3]*matrix[3][1]+
00356                 matrix[0][3]*matrix[2][1]*matrix[3][2]-
00357                 matrix[0][3]*matrix[2][2]*matrix[3][1]-
00358                 matrix[0][2]*matrix[2][1]*matrix[3][3]-
00359                 matrix[0][1]*matrix[2][3]*matrix[3][2]))+
00360 
00361                 (matrix[2][0]*(
00362                 matrix[0][1]*matrix[1][2]*matrix[3][3]+
00363                 matrix[0][2]*matrix[1][3]*matrix[3][1]+
00364                 matrix[0][3]*matrix[1][1]*matrix[3][2]-
00365                 matrix[0][3]*matrix[1][2]*matrix[3][1]-
00366                 matrix[0][2]*matrix[1][1]*matrix[3][3]-
00367                 matrix[0][1]*matrix[1][3]*matrix[3][2]))+
00368 
00369                 ((-1)*matrix[3][0]*(
00370                 matrix[0][1]*matrix[1][2]*matrix[2][3]+
00371                 matrix[0][2]*matrix[1][3]*matrix[2][1]+
00372                 matrix[0][3]*matrix[1][1]*matrix[2][2]-
00373                 matrix[0][3]*matrix[1][2]*matrix[2][1]-
00374                 matrix[0][2]*matrix[1][1]*matrix[2][3]-
00375                 matrix[0][1]*matrix[1][3]*matrix[2][2]))
00376         );
00377 }

00433 
00434 template <class _Traits> bool mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::inDiametralCircle(sVertex *v1, sVertex *v2, sVertex *v MF_DMUTEXV)
00435 {
00436         /*
00437         if ( ((v1->getCoord(0) - v->getCoord(0))*(v2->getCoord(0) - v->getCoord(0)) + (v1->getCoord(1) - v->getCoord(1))*(v2->getCoord(1) - v->getCoord(1))) < -MF_ERRO )
00438                 return true;
00439 
00440         return false;
00441         */
00442 
00443         space x,y,r,d;
00444         x = ( v1->getCoord(0) + v2->getCoord(0) ) / 2.0;
00445         y = ( v1->getCoord(1) + v2->getCoord(1) ) / 2.0;
00446         r = sqrt( (x-v1->getCoord(0))*(x-v1->getCoord(0)) + (y-v1->getCoord(1))*(y-v1->getCoord(1)) );
00447         d = sqrt( (x-v->getCoord(0))*(x-v->getCoord(0)) + (y-v->getCoord(1))*(y-v->getCoord(1)) );
00448         if( r < ( d - erro) )
00449                 return false;
00450         else
00451                 return true;    
00452 }
00453 
00454 template <class _Traits> bool mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::sameVertices(sVertex *v1, sVertex *v2 MF_DMUTEXV)
00455 {
00456         return (fabs(v1->getCoord(0) - v2->getCoord(0)) < erro ) && ( fabs(v1->getCoord(1) - v2->getCoord(1)) < erro );
00457 }
00458 
00459 template <class _Traits> int mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::orientation2D(ids *idvertices, sVertex **vertices MF_DMUTEXV)
00460 {
00461         //Retorna 0 caso os vertices sejam colineares
00462         // Retorna 1 caso a orientacao foi arrumada
00463         // Retorna 2 caso a orientacao ja esteja correta
00464 
00465         // verificando orientacao da celula
00466         space x0,y0,x1,y1,p, n0,n1;
00467 
00468         x0 = vertices[1]->getCoord(0 MF_MUTEXV) - vertices[0]->getCoord(0 MF_MUTEXV);
00469         y0 = vertices[1]->getCoord(1 MF_MUTEXV) - vertices[0]->getCoord(1 MF_MUTEXV);
00470 
00471         n0 = sqrt(x0*x0 + y0*y0);
00472         x0 /= n0;
00473         y0 /= n0;
00474 
00475         x1 = vertices[2]->getCoord(0 MF_MUTEXV) - vertices[0]->getCoord(0 MF_MUTEXV);
00476         y1 = vertices[2]->getCoord(1 MF_MUTEXV) - vertices[0]->getCoord(1 MF_MUTEXV);
00477 
00478         n1 = sqrt(x1*x1 + y1*y1);
00479         x1 /= n1;
00480         y1 /= n1;
00481 
00482         p = (x0*y1 - x1*y0);
00483 
00484         if (p < - erro)
00485         {
00486                 sVertex *vaux = vertices[0];
00487                 ids temp = idvertices[0];
00488 
00489                 vertices[0] = vertices[2];
00490                 idvertices[0] = idvertices[2];
00491 
00492                 vertices[2] = vaux;
00493                 idvertices[2] = temp;
00494 
00495                 return 1;
00496         }
00497         else
00498         {
00499                 if (p > erro)
00500                         return 2;
00501                 else
00502                         return 0;
00503         }
00504 }
00505 
00506 template <class _Traits> int mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::orientation3D(ids *idvertices, sVertex **vertices MF_DMUTEXV)
00507 {
00508         //Retorna 0 caso os vertices sejam coplanares
00509         // Retorna 1 caso a orientacao foi arrumada
00510         // Retorna 2 caso a orientacao ja esteja correta
00511 
00512 // se sao coplanares
00513 //      if()
00514 //              return 0;
00515 //      else
00516                 return orientation2D(idvertices, vertices);
00517 }
00518 
00519 template <class _Traits> bool mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::isBadCell(sCell *c, space beta MF_DMUTEXV)
00520 {
00521         sVertex *v0 = mesh->getVertex(c->getVertexId(0)),
00522                 *v1 = mesh->getVertex(c->getVertexId(1)),
00523                 *v2 = mesh->getVertex(c->getVertexId(2));
00524 
00525         space r, circ[2], d1, d2, d3,resp = 0;
00526 
00527         getCircuncircle(c,circ);
00528 
00529         r = sqrt((v0->getCoord(0) - circ[0])*(v0->getCoord(0) - circ[0]) +
00530                  (v0->getCoord(1) - circ[1])*(v0->getCoord(1) - circ[1]) );
00531 
00532         d1 = dist(v0,v1);
00533         d2 = dist(v0,v2);
00534         d3 = dist(v2,v1);
00535 //      d1 = sqrt(      (v0->getCoord(0) - v1->getCoord(0))*
00536 //                      (v0->getCoord(0) - v1->getCoord(0))+
00537 //                      (v0->getCoord(1) - v1->getCoord(1))*
00538 //                      (v0->getCoord(1) - v1->getCoord(1)));
00539 //      d2 = sqrt(      (v0->getCoord(0) - v2->getCoord(0))*
00540 //                      (v0->getCoord(0) - v2->getCoord(0))+
00541 //                      (v0->getCoord(1) - v2->getCoord(1))*
00542 //                      (v0->getCoord(1) - v2->getCoord(1)));
00543 //      d3 = sqrt(      (v2->getCoord(0) - v1->getCoord(0))*
00544 //                      (v2->getCoord(0) - v1->getCoord(0))+
00545 //                      (v2->getCoord(1) - v1->getCoord(1))*
00546 //                      (v2->getCoord(1) - v1->getCoord(1)));
00547 
00548         if(( d1 < d2 ) && ( d1 < d3))
00549                 resp = r/d1;
00550         else if(( d2 < d1 ) && ( d2 < d3))
00551                 resp = r/d2;
00552         else if(( d3 < d1 ) && ( d3 < d2))
00553                 resp = r/d3;
00554 
00555         return (resp > beta);
00556 }
00557 
00558 template <class _Traits> void mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::getCircuncircle(space *c0, space *c1, space *c2, space *coords MF_DMUTEXV)
00559 {
00560         space a[3][3], bx[3][3], by[3][3];
00561 
00562         a[0][0] = c0[0]; a[0][1] = c0[1]; a[0][2] = 1;
00563         a[1][0] = c1[0]; a[1][1] = c1[1]; a[1][2] = 1;
00564         a[2][0] = c2[0]; a[2][1] = c2[1]; a[2][2] = 1;
00565 
00566         space deta = det3(a);
00567 
00568         bx[0][0] = (c0[0]*c0[0])+(c0[1]*c0[1]); bx[0][1] = c0[1]; bx[0][2] = 1;
00569         bx[1][0] = (c1[0]*c1[0])+(c1[1]*c1[1]); bx[1][1] = c1[1]; bx[1][2] = 1;
00570         bx[2][0] = (c2[0]*c2[0])+(c2[1]*c2[1]); bx[2][1] = c2[1]; bx[2][2] = 1;
00571 
00572         space detbx = det3(bx);
00573 
00574         by[0][0] = (c0[0]*c0[0])+(c0[1]*c0[1]); by[0][1] = c0[0]; by[0][2] = 1;
00575         by[1][0] = (c1[0]*c1[0])+(c1[1]*c1[1]); by[1][1] = c1[0]; by[1][2] = 1;
00576         by[2][0] = (c2[0]*c2[0])+(c2[1]*c2[1]); by[2][1] = c2[0]; by[2][2] = 1;
00577 
00578         space detby = ((-1)*(det3(by)));
00579 
00580         coords[0] = (detbx/(2*deta));
00581         coords[1] = (detby/(2*deta));
00582 }
00583 
00584 template <class _Traits> void mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::getCircuncircle(sCell *c, space *coords MF_DMUTEXV)
00585 {
00586         sVertex *v0 = mesh->getVertex(c->getVertexId(0)),
00587                 *v1 = mesh->getVertex(c->getVertexId(1)),
00588                 *v2 = mesh->getVertex(c->getVertexId(2));
00589 
00590         //space a, b, num, den;
00591         space *c0 = v0->getCoords(), *c1 = v1->getCoords(), *c2 = v2->getCoords();
00592 
00593         /*
00594         a = ( c1[0] - c0[0] ) * ( c1[0] - c0[0] ) + 
00595                 ( c1[1] - c0[1] ) * ( c1[1] - c0[1] );
00596 
00597         b = ( c2[0] - c0[0] ) * ( c2[0] - c0[0] ) + 
00598                 ( c2[1] - c0[1] ) * ( c2[1] - c0[1] );
00599 
00600         den = ( c1[1] - c0[1] ) * ( c2[0] - c0[0] ) - 
00601                   ( c2[1] - c0[1] ) * ( c1[0] - c0[0] );
00602 
00603         num = ( c1[1] - c0[1] ) * b - ( c2[1] - c0[1] ) * a;
00604         coords[0] = c0[0] + 0.5 * num / den;
00605 
00606         num = ( c2[0] - c0[0] ) * a - ( c1[0] - c0[0] ) * b;
00607         coords[1] = c0[1] + 0.5 * num / den;
00608 
00609         */
00610         space a[3][3], bx[3][3], by[3][3];
00611 
00612         a[0][0] = c0[0]; a[0][1] = c0[1]; a[0][2] = 1;
00613         a[1][0] = c1[0]; a[1][1] = c1[1]; a[1][2] = 1;
00614         a[2][0] = c2[0]; a[2][1] = c2[1]; a[2][2] = 1;
00615 
00616         space deta = det3(a);
00617 
00618         bx[0][0] = (c0[0]*c0[0])+(c0[1]*c0[1]); bx[0][1] = c0[1]; bx[0][2] = 1;
00619         bx[1][0] = (c1[0]*c1[0])+(c1[1]*c1[1]); bx[1][1] = c1[1]; bx[1][2] = 1;
00620         bx[2][0] = (c2[0]*c2[0])+(c2[1]*c2[1]); bx[2][1] = c2[1]; bx[2][2] = 1;
00621 
00622         space detbx = det3(bx);
00623 
00624         by[0][0] = (c0[0]*c0[0])+(c0[1]*c0[1]); by[0][1] = c0[0]; by[0][2] = 1;
00625         by[1][0] = (c1[0]*c1[0])+(c1[1]*c1[1]); by[1][1] = c1[0]; by[1][2] = 1;
00626         by[2][0] = (c2[0]*c2[0])+(c2[1]*c2[1]); by[2][1] = c2[0]; by[2][2] = 1;
00627 
00628         space detby = ((-1)*(det3(by)));
00629 
00630         coords[0] = (detbx/(2*deta));
00631         coords[1] = (detby/(2*deta));
00632 
00633 //      space d1, d2, d3;
00634 //      d1 = sqrt( (coords[0] - c0[0])*(coords[0] - c0[0]) + (coords[1] - c0[1])*(coords[1] - c0[1]) );
00635 //      d2 = sqrt( (coords[0] - c1[0])*(coords[0] - c1[0]) + (coords[1] - c1[1])*(coords[1] - c1[1]) );
00636 //      d3 = sqrt( (coords[0] - c2[0])*(coords[0] - c2[0]) + (coords[1] - c2[1])*(coords[1] - c2[1]) );
00637 //
00638 //      MF_ASSERT( fabs(d1-d2) < erro );
00639 //      MF_ASSERT( fabs(d1-d3) < erro );
00640 //      MF_ASSERT( fabs(d3-d2) < erro );
00641 }
00642 
00643 template <class _Traits> SPACE mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::det3(space matrix[3][3])
00644 {
00645         return((matrix[0][0]*matrix[1][1]*matrix[2][2])+
00646                 (matrix[1][0]*matrix[2][1]*matrix[0][2])+
00647                 (matrix[0][1]*matrix[1][2]*matrix[2][0])-
00648                 (matrix[0][2]*matrix[1][1]*matrix[2][0])-
00649                 (matrix[0][1]*matrix[1][0]*matrix[2][2])-
00650                 (matrix[0][0]*matrix[2][1]*matrix[1][2]));
00651 }
00652 
00653 template <class _Traits> SPACE mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::dot(ids p1, ids p2, space *coords MF_DMUTEXV)
00654 {
00655         sVertex *v1 = mesh->getVertex(p1), *v2 = mesh->getVertex(p2);
00656         double vv1X, vv1Y, vv2X, vv2Y, dp;
00657 
00658         vv1X = v1->getCoord(0) - coords[0];
00659         vv1Y = v1->getCoord(1) - coords[1];
00660         vv2X = v2->getCoord(0) - coords[0];
00661         vv2Y = v2->getCoord(1) - coords[1];
00662 
00663         dp = (vv1X * vv2X) + (vv1Y * vv2Y);
00664 
00665         return(dp);
00666 }
00667 
00668 
00669 
00670 // este metodo calcula o cosseno do angulo entre os vetores 2D: (p1-p_ang) e (p2-p_ang)
00671 template <class _Traits> SPACE mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::vecAngle(ids p1, ids p_ang, ids p2)
00672 {
00673         sVertex *v1 = mesh->getVertex(p1),
00674                 *v2 = mesh->getVertex(p2),
00675                 *v_ang = mesh->getVertex(p_ang);
00676         double vv1X, vv1Y, vv2X, vv2Y, dp, aux;
00677 
00678         vv1X = v1->getCoord(0) - v_ang->getCoord(0);
00679         vv1Y = v1->getCoord(1) - v_ang->getCoord(1);
00680         vv2X = v2->getCoord(0) - v_ang->getCoord(0);
00681         vv2Y = v2->getCoord(1) - v_ang->getCoord(1);
00682 
00683         dp = (vv1X * vv2X) + (vv1Y * vv2Y);
00684 
00685         aux = sqrt( vv1X*vv1X + vv1Y*vv1Y )*sqrt( vv2X*vv2X + vv2Y*vv2Y );
00686 
00687         return (dp/aux);
00688 }
00689 
00690 template <class _Traits> SPACE mfGeometric<_Traits>::norm2d(space *coords)
00691 {
00692         return sqrt(coords[0]*coords[0] + coords[1]*coords[1]);
00693 }
00694 
00695 template <class _Traits> SPACE mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::areaTriangle2D(space *x, space *y, space *z)
00696 {
00697         return fabs( (x[1]-z[1])*(y[2]-z[2])-(x[2]-z[2])*(y[1]-z[1]) )/2;
00698 }
00699 
00700 template <class _Traits> SPACE mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::areaTriangle2D(sCell *c)
00701 {
00702         
00703         return areaTriangle2D(mesh->getVertex(c->getVertexId(0))->getCoords(), mesh->getVertex(c->getVertexId(1))->getCoords(), mesh->getVertex(c->getVertexId(2))->getCoords());
00704 }

00706 
00707 template <class _Traits> bool mfGeometric2D<_Traits>::isDelaunay(ids idcell)
00708 {
00709 //      sCell *c = mesh->getCell(idcell);
00710         ids mates[3] = {mesh->getCell(idcell)->getMateId(0), mesh->getCell(idcell)->getMateId(1), mesh->getCell(idcell)->getMateId(2)};
00711         sVertex *v;
00712 
00713         for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00714         {
00715                 if(mates[i] != -1)
00716                 {
00717                         v = mesh->getVertex( mesh->getCell(mates[i])->getVertexId(mesh->getCell(mates[i])->getMateIndex(idcell)) );
00718                         if( inCircle(mesh->getCell(idcell), v) != 0)
00719                                 return false;
00720                 }
00721         }
00722 
00723         return true;
00724 }
